text: 8.5: Kis 19.16-19; Wkp 16.12; 1 Kin 19.11; Ese 10.2; FG 4.31; VB 4.5; 11.19; 16.18Mba Fhe Bakɨme enser mbara mba artaran vhava ndigap, mba rui ki thuuaŋ suegim, ana za givigi. Ana za givigim, ana ana fegap, kha nuiana khɨngi. Ana ana fekhɨngim, buip phɨrerim, khɨkhɨɨ bakɨvi him, buip vhekvhegap fhura shɨkshɨga ndogap, kha nuianan vuim, khɨmkhɨk kha nuiana suirav ana nɨɨŋkui. Bari, ana parawa fara muuŋgi mba ma. (8.3)
